summary: Does what it says in the title. Has protection for children in quests.
descriptionHtml:
Works on all child races. Instructions inside.

However there is one small bug as Dorthe in Riverwood will get bigger when using the blacksmith\'s tools. To correct this bring up the console, type \"setscale 1\" click on her and then hit enter. I\'m working on a fix for this.
IMPORTANT! (for original version)
(Found by JranZu)
Do not kill the two kids (Aventus Aretino and Nelkir) as this will screw up quests!

V2 adds protection for quest kids.

[youtube]6CmPwHCgcsQ[/youtube]
author: illegalluggage
